messages.msgSnippet: ... 2.  I ... Heather I met in Alaska?) Welcome to the list.:) ... in which they can learn. ... Hi Ren!  It is going great!  I was shocked to see all the
messages.messageBody:
--- In UnschoolingDiscussion@yahoogroups.com, Ren
<starsuncloud@n...> wrote:
>
> "I'm Heather, mom of 3 great kids, Tanner 7, Hunter 5 and Haley
2. I
> started out homeschooling Tanner and soon discovered unschooling."
>
> Hi Heather! Howzit going up North? (I'm assuming this is the
Heather I met in Alaska?) Welcome to the list.:)
>
> Ren
>
>
>
> "I never teach my pupils; I only attempt to provide the conditions
in which they can learn."
> Albert Einstein

Hi Ren! It is going great! I was shocked to see all the postings
here over the weekend...I guess this gets used way more than
unschooling.com!! I'm not sure if I can keep up! LOL! It was
really great to meet you and hopefully we can meet up this summer
when you and Heidi go on your big adventure I have been hearing
about!!

~Heather

messages.subject: Welcome Heather
messages.msgSnippet: I m Heather, mom of 3 great kids, Tanner 7, Hunter 5 and Haley 2.  I started out homeschooling Tanner and soon discovered unschooling. Hi Heather!  Howzit
messages.messageBody:
"I'm Heather, mom of 3 great kids, Tanner 7, Hunter 5 and Haley 2. I
started out homeschooling Tanner and soon discovered unschooling."

Hi Heather! Howzit going up North? (I'm assuming this is the Heather I met in Alaska?) Welcome to the list.:)

Ren



"I never teach my pupils; I only attempt to provide the conditions in which they can learn."
Albert Einstein
